# Engineering Department SOP These are the list of SOPs that Engineering Personnel should follow. These are, as stated before, [bold]not checklists[/bold] and should be treated as guidelines.
For clarification, [color=#c8a404][bold]Station Engineer[/bold][/color] and [color=#c8a404][bold]Technical Assistant[/bold][/color] are combined into the same entry, and should be followed as such.
The following jobs have entries in this Department, with [color=#1b67a5][bold]Chief Engineer[/bold][/color] being the Head of Staff: - [textlink="Chief Engineer" link="ChiefEngineer SOP"] - [textlink="Atmospheric Technician" link="AtmosTech SOP"] - [textlink="Station Engineer" link="StationEngineer SOP"] - [textlink="Technical Assistant" link="StationEngineer SOP"]
